duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct, hands-on verification of sample inventory to ensure quality execution of policies and procedures related to sample storage.
Assist in the development, implementation, and management of a formal program to perform scheduled and random audits related to sample inventory for integrity and accuracy.
Monitor specialty sample category segregation to ensure client needs are met.
Perform quarterly review of randomly selected sample storage environments to ensure inventory accuracy.
Lead sample inventory verification program to track, report and research inventory discrepancies to make necessary corrections.
Analyze, maintain, and reconcile inventory verification to ensure client and internal requirements are met.
Perform thorough research using all available resources to identify root causes and supply possible solutions.
Work with key personnel to implement process improvements to optimize overall accuracy of sample inventory.
Establish, capture, and manage inventory control metrics.
Facilitate customers inventory audits and provide information to customers upon request.
Assist others in resolving technical or operational problems to ensure an accurate and timely resolution of sample inventory discrepancies.
Maintain list of suppliers and take inventory and re-order consumables via Oracle.
Monitor and maintain sufficient levels of supplies.
Improve inventory software functionality, manage supply stock locations, lead times, and re-order points.
Create purchase order documentation for approval.
Foster effective and cordial relationships with suppliers and vendors.
Maintain a safe work environment by following all established safety guidelines and procedures.
Ensure adherence to all company policies, guidelines, and SOPs.
Identify, investigate, and report service failures appropriately.
Document and follow through with root cause analysis and corrective and preventative actions for errors and discrepancies.
Assist in developing, implementing, validating, and testing of new processes.
Perform routine and non-routine quality checks as directed.
